title: Permanent suspension
body: Just the other day , i played in an internet cafe near my house and didnt notice "Mk Jogo" and I think curse voice was automatically used , And this morning i got "permanently suspended" for using 3rd party Programs And mods , I am innocent and i have been playing alot this year from bronze 3 to now gold 3 . ive put in so much time and effort on this and bought rp . Have been playing this since season 3 just to know that i have been "permanently suspended" . So my question is CAN I RECOVER MY ACCOUNT BACK!?? This is really depressing and i hope riot can resolve this . I have emailed 2 tickets regarding this and they never answer me if i can get it back or not . I can provide any details about my account for the past year that i have been playing . eg my first ever name summoner name , my first few friends in the

replies.body: What im saying is that . Im innocent and ive never scripted or chieated at all

Seems kinda sus.

What you're **meant** to do is apply for an appeal, which is via e-mail to a red. Additionally, the guidelines (left of every page on this board) explicitly state that you shouldn't post content related to account suspensions here.

Have you tried appealing yet?

You're providing details about account recovery. You're trying to remove a ban from your account, which is something entirely different.

Are you saying that you weren't the person who may have done the actions causing you to be permanently suspended?
